ahh shoot.. I wan't Commander Adama and Buzz Aldrin leading my crew!

You'd need Crew Manifest, and it's not updated to .20 yet. (I think.)

Alternatively, open the save file with Notepad and change their names manually. It's not difficult.

You can edit your persistent.sfs in in your KSP folder under *\saves\(name of your saved game).

Near the top you'll find this:

CREW

{

name = Jebediah Kerman

brave = 0.5

dumb = 0.5

badS = True

state = 1

ToD = 0

idx = 0

}

Just change the name to whatever you want and save the changes. Next time you load your game his name will have changed.
It works for .20 currently with limited funtionality. Still an improvement over stock though.
